DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To assess cardiac effect energy drink blood pressure heart rhythm healthy subject . Study design : Double blind , placebo control , cross-over Study population : Healthy human volunteer ( active-duty ) age 18 40 year medical condition . Intervention : 5 Hour Energy Placebo Primary outcome : Change office systolic blood pressure
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer ( activeduty ) age 1840 year No comorbid condition No active prescription OTC drug use Not pregnant plan become pregnant study participation
